backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the trade listing backend with types for Roblox accounts and brainrot items, and methods to create, retrieve, and close listings stored in a map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four product features (homepage listings, post-trade form, listing detail view, visual theme) to their implementing frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark modes, defining color variables for backgrounds, borders, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Brainrot Trade Hub' with a brainrot icon favicon and a root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for home, post-trade, and listing detail pages, all wrapped in a shared Layout with a Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the site brand, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/ItemTypeSelector: Form component that lets users toggle between a Roblox Account (username, level, inventory) and a Brainrot Item (description), rendering conditional input fields for each type.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that composes Navigation and Footer around a centered main content area with consistent max-width and padding.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header with the site logo, a link to the listings home page, and a 'Post Trade' button with active-state styling based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/TradeListingCard: A card component that displays a trade listing summary, showing the offered and requested items (Roblox account or brainrot item), poster name, creation date, and open/closed status with a link to the detail page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context backed by the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching active listings, all listings, and listing details, plus mutations for creating and closing trade listings against the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Nunito font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system including neon and orange accent tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The home page displaying a hero banner, stats bar (active/completed trade counts), and a tabbed grid of trade listing cards with loading skeletons, plus a link to post a new trade.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: A detail page for a single trade listing that shows full item information for both offered and requested items, creation timestamp, status badge, and a button to close/complete the listing.
frontend/src/pages/PostTradePage.tsx: React page component that renders a form for creating a new trade listing, with fields for display name, offered item, and requested item (supporting Roblox account or brainrot item types), including validation and submission via the useCreateListing mutation hook.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Nunito), OKLCH-based color tokens (neon, orange, surface, etc.), neon/orange box shadows, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the Roblox-to-Brainrot trading website's implemented features (homepage listings, post-trade form, listing detail view, visual theme) and pending feature requests (backend data model and API for trade listings).
